content.description: If the infinite series <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, a, sub n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> diverges, <math alttext="S sub n, equals the sum, from k equals 0, to n, of, a, sub k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>S</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the limit as n approaches infinity of, b sub n, is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><msub><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, which of the following statements must be true?
content.question: <math alttext="the limit as n approaches infinity, of, a, sub n, is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="the limit as n approaches infinity, of, s sub n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><msub><mrow><mi>S</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> does not exist.<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, b sub n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> diverges.

topic.text: 10.3: (BC ONLY) The Nth Term Test for Divergence

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
